root.name: Miku Flick
root.description: OverviewA rhythm game featuring Hatsune Miku which tweaks the controls and gameplay of the Project Diva games to suit the iPad and iPhone. Miku Flick is the first entry in the Project Diva series to be released in North America. It features 13 songs, a PV mode with pre-rendered video, and can be configured to display either hiragana or roman letters.
